Module Minesweeper
Package swe.group_nine.controller

Class Square

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.ButtonBase
javafx.scene.control.Button
swe.group_nine.controller.Square
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class Square
extends javafx.scene.control.Button
The Square class implements logic for the individual square of the Minesweeper game.

      locY - the y location of the square
      isMine - The parameter that determines whether the square is a mine

      e - mouse input for revealing the square
